function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Correlation between temperature and AH impacting viability prediction","Impact":"Reduced predictive capability, potential misunderstanding of findings","Mitigation":"Consider using a more robust model that accounts for the correlation between temperature and AH","Technologies":"Statistical modeling with orthogonal predictors","People":"Researchers, epidemiologists","Owner":"Data analysts, modeling experts"},{"Description":"Multicollinearity in regression model","Impact":"Reduced model accuracy, invalidation of model results","Mitigation":"Use techniques like ridge regression or principal component analysis to address multicollinearity","Technologies":"Ridge regression, principal component analysis","People":"Data analysts, statisticians","Owner":"Modeling experts, statisticians"},{"Description":"Inaccurate assessment of virus viability","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data, flawed conclusions","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough sensitivity analysis and validation of models, consider alternative statistical approaches","Technologies":"Sensitivity analysis tools, model validation techniques","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Modeling experts, public health officials"}]}
